Description.Text: The Hotel San Luca is located in the Piazza Garibaldi in the historic centre of Cortona (within city walls), on a magnificent natural panoramic terrace overlooking the Val di Chiana and the Lake Trasimeno. The Hotel consists of 60 elegantly furnished rooms equipped with all comforts such as direct dial telephone, air conditioning, satellite TV, minibar, safe. Cozy and modern at the same time the hotel also provides guests with equipped rooms for meetings and receptions (rooms equipped with overhead video projector, white board, light board and slide projector). Our business centre is able to provide guests with internet connection and PC room (extra charged). Red tiled roofs seem to climb on top of each other interspersed with turrets and bell-towers up to the well-lighted via San Sebastiano running above part of the city walls as you look out from one of the wonderful terraces of our hotel. Other terraces look out over the fertile Val di Chiana stretching at the foot of the hill of Cortona. The Hotel is open all year round and is easily reached also by public transport.
